uvi.description:
cifs: prevent NULL deref in cifs_compose_mount_options()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.13.5 by commit ae3d181f4e912f51af7776ea165f199b16fc165d. For more details please see the references link.
